Title: PGA TOUR® Flat-Front Expandable Waist Shorts
Description:
When you bend down to gauge your last winning putt, the last thing you want is for your shorts to rip and break in the wrong places. Our PGA TOUR Men's DriFlux Golf Performance Expandable Waist Flat Front Shorts have a comfort waistband that moves with you when you bend, stretch, run, whatever you decide to do. With our powerful sun blocking UPF 50 rating for superior sun protection—you’ll be hard-pressed to find a better choice for premium golf wear.
Part of Our Core Bottoms Collection: Comfortable, sturdy and reliable, these core bottoms have got you covered through all your daily wardrobe needs. Mix and match our core bottoms with our large collection of men’s core tops for a new look every day that fits your busy schedule.
Where/How to Wear:  On the course, on the court or even when you're having a midday lunch with the boys. Pair these men’s golf shorts with a PGA TOUR men's polo shirt to complete the look.

Title: Hanes Ultimate Comfort Blend Mens 4 Pack Boxer Briefs
Description:
If you're looking for form and function in stretch boxer brief underwear, you've found it in Hanes® ComfortBlend® performance boxer briefs. These sleek, sexy boxer briefs are made of Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This performance cotton-blend underwear is also made with Hanes®'s FreshIQ™ advanced odor protection technology that fights odor-causing bacteria for all-day freshness. There's also the soft Comfort Flex® stretch logo waistband that keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or rolling. With no-itch tagless styling, these moisture-wicking, Hanes®-best stretch boxer briefs are available in a convenient 4-pack of assorted colors for easy stock-up shopping.
